pullrequest.title: Resubmit the mixtures of Gaussians code

content.raw:
@mlibbrecht : supposing I have fixes for this patch, would be inadvisable to create a fork from Shiqi's repository, since he is away (and thus unable to merge it)? In which case, what course of action would you recommend?

Thanks.
